message.body: I don't think anyone sawy everyspeed post. I hate Facebook. Just write congrats 10 times In the comments!
I know! I didn't even bother to share bc I knew I'd get 1 like! I'll tell cayce to write congrats.
thanks for doing that domain stuff!
It doesn't even exist into news feed. What the shit! No problem!
fb sucks. I texted ariel and told her I couldn't afford to come to the reading/party and she said she wished I could come but we would celebrate soon. unbelievable
For reallll!!!!??! OMG!
haha I asked him to, that was quick!
I know it's so sad and crazy. I'm hoping it'll click or charlie will talk some sense into her. but seriously I worked on that shit for free for MONTHS
Maybe it will take a day for it to click
Haha Cayce just said congrats hahajaja
I know!!!
So much work.
I also read one of the articles and it said she cut the trailer haha
Maybe "cut" means produced in book world
Or directed?
she has also failed to mention me in any of her posts
I read that and was like Oh no!
I mean I Could pay to go there but that's insane!
It would at least be fun!
no way
She should pay. OMG the ES post just went to the top of my feed
hahahahaha told you it needs to say congrats!
like I said before $0 is one thing, negative amounts are unacceptable
And apparently you reap no rewards either!
should have made the credits 10 mins long
And your name on one single Page
hahah
this is the life of crew!
you should
I guess there's nothing we can do about that
My sister is complaining about how mobile unfriendly our site it
I'm gonna punch her
congrats on your nomination!
Thanks! I didn't even know
you found out afterwards? that's crazy!
Dan told me!!
what! they should tell you!
could you ask your editor what she knows about running fcp 7 on the new os? I'm still using lion because I've head it doesn't work on the newer ones
Haha she asked me that question! I upgraded to maverick and 7 still works.
oh really? I thought with mt lion it was buggy and maverick didn't support it at all
I lve definitely used it a bunch.
I'm scared to risk it, about to go to the apple store and I'm sure they'll want me to upgrade. do you like mavericks?
I had to upgrade to get FCPX for some sound sync. It seems pretty much the same, looks more cartoon like.
haha and you haven't had any trouble? but you can't run x and 7 at the same time right?
I haven't actually tried. They don't use the same motion/compressor so you have to put them in separate folders
oh apple
hmmm. my battery is shot and the fan seems to be working overtime. crunching sounds!
Such crap!
My computer started making crunching sounds. Like it's eating chips.
Uh oh.
How old is yours?
2011. I got it specifically so I could use lion
Haha. Ugh.
